abstract: James C. Woolery will become the co-head of JPMorgan’s North American mergers business.
snippet: James C. Woolery will become the co-head of JPMorgan’s North American mergers business.
lead_paragraph: JPMorgan Chase said on Thursday that it had hired James C. Woolery, one of the top deal lawyers at Cravath, Swaine & Moore, as one of its senior mergers bankers, marking the latest big shift by a lawyer into banking.

headline.main: Cravath’s Woolery to Join JPMorgan as Senior Deal Maker

byline.original: By Michael J. de la Merced
